William Marchek

4110 SE Hawthorne blvd · Portland, OR 97214 · (503) 277-8725 · william.marchek@gmail.com

A web developer with a passion for learning how to better leverage new technologies and agile methodologies to help address the many challenges that clients face in web development, from design concept through application development and deployment. Proven track-record of delivering solutions that help enhance the client’s overall value proposition through (i) socializing with the client to understand objectives, establish expectations, and develop a project plan, (ii) following an iterative development approach to ensure that problems are identified and resolved more quickly and to implement course corrections if needed, and (iii) fostering a collaborative environment to help arrive at creative, timely and joint solutions. Looking forward to joining a team of passionate people to both grow professionally and to contribute.

Interests

Apart from being a web developer, I enjoy spending my free time outdoors exploring: hiking, camping, rock climbing, surfing, snowboarding, I also enjoy traveling and live with my partner and hound dog in a self-bult tiny house truck..

I'm also passionate about music and have been actively writing music, establishing a band, and performing for over a decade.
